[affinity\anti-affinity server group]

This set of configs for terraform creates:
    - server group (affinity\anti-affinity by var server_group)
    - flavor
    - key_pair
    - security_group (ping, ssh)
    - VM
        - count
        - volume by image
        - port by network
        - server group

To crete VM in specify host\az use "az_hint" variable

variables list:
- qty = <int_quantity of VMs>
- vm_name = "<vm_name>"
- keypair = {
    name        = "terraform_key_test"
    public_key  = "ssh-rsa  Generated-by-Nova"
  }
- image_name = "<image_name>"
- boot_volume_size" = "<int_volume_size_in_GB"
- flavor_name = "<flavor_name>"
- vcpus = <int_vcpus>
- ram = <int_in_bites>
- flavor_disk = 0
- flavor" = {
#  description = "Please flavor name"
#  default     = {
#    name        = var.flavor_name
#    vcpus       = var.vcpus
#    ram         = var.ram
#    disk        = var.default_flavor_disk
#    is_public   = "true"
#  }
#}
- az_hint = "<az_name>:<hyper_name>"
- network_name = "pub_net"
- server_group = {
    name      = "terraform_affinity_sg"
    policies = [
      "affinity"
    ]
  }
- AZs = {}
